title: Fortunately, I Met You - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Couple Growth   Doctors   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Smart Couple   Wealthy Characters
author: Sunny   桑妮
description:
Cheng Xi, a guileless psychiatrist with a heart of gold, who would do anything for her patients. Lu Chenzhou, a frigid businessman who refuses treatment for his emotional detachment.

This is the story of a man’s stubborn frozen heart and a woman’s fiery determination to thaw it. >
